properties.entry: {0} must be a valid integer value.
{0} must be a valid integer value.
{0} must be unique. {1} is already in use.
{0} must be an integer value greater than or equal to {1}.
{0} must be an integer value less than or equal to {1}.
{0} must be a decimal value greater than or equal to {1}.
{0} must be a decimal value less than or equal to {1}.
{0} must be at least {1} characters long.
{0} must be shorter than or equal to {1} characters.
